name: UISimpleTextPrintFormatter
desc: An object that lays out plain text for printing, possibly over multiple pages.

items.name: init(attributedText: NSAttributedString)
items.desc: Returns a simple-text print formatter initialized with attributed text.

items.name: init(text: String)
items.desc: Returns a simple-text print formatter initialized with plain text.

items.name: var font: UIFont?
items.desc: The font of the printed text.

items.name: var color: UIColor?
items.desc: The color of the printed text.

items.name: var textAlignment: NSTextAlignment
items.desc: The alignment of the printed text.
